snippet: The growing presence of women senators is most pronounced on the Armed Services Committee, where they have forced the long-simmering issue of sexual assault in the military to the forefront.
abstract: Growing presence of women senators is most pronounced on the Armed Services Committee, where they have forced long-simmering issue of sexual assault in the military to the forefront; women now hold 18 spots in the four most prestigious Senate panels, increase of nearly 65 percent over last decade.
lead_paragraph: The growing presence of women senators is most pronounced on the Armed Services Committee, where they have forced the long-simmering issue of sexual assault in the military to the forefront.

headline.main: Women in the Senate Confront the Military on Sex Assaults
headline.print_headline: Women in the Senate Confront The Military on Sex Assaults
